meanings.definition: Having the power or quality of an incantation.
meanings.sent1: The mysterious potion had an incantational effect on the villagers.
meanings.sent2: The old book exuded an incantational aura of mystery.
meanings.sent3: The incantational aroma of the bakery drew in customers from afar.
meanings.sent4: His incantational gaze seemed to hypnotize those around him.
meanings.sent5: The incantational touch of the healer brought instant relief to the patient.
